name: loan-management-root
description: Loan Management System with Frontend and Smart Contracts

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.coverage: cd backend && hardhat coverage && node scripts/clean-coverage.js
scripts.coverage:core: cd backend && hardhat test --grep 'LendingManager|LiquidityPool|StablecoinManager' && hardhat coverage --testfiles 'backend/test/LendingManager.test.js'
